summary: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.
cast: Michael Berryman|Peter Brocco|Dean R. Brooks|Alonzo Brown|Scatman Crothers|Mwako Cumbuka|Danny DeVito|William Duell|Josip Elic|Lan Fendors|Louise Fletcher|Nathan George|Ken Kenny|Mel Lambert|Sydney Lassick|Kay Lee|Christopher Lloyd|Dwight Marfield|Ted Markland|Louisa Moritz|Jack Nicholson|William Redfield|Philip Roth|Will Sampson|Mimi Sarkisian|Vincent Schiavelli|Mews Small|Delos V. Smith Jr.|Tin Welch|Brad Dourif|Aurore Clément|Bill Gratton|Anjelica Huston|Audrey Landers|Tom McCall|James V. Shore|Saul Zaentz
title: Alguien voló sobre el nido del cuco
